item.title: Ernesto Cardenal, Nicaraguan poet and priest, dies at 95
item.description: MANAGUA, Nicaragua (AP) — Ernesto Cardenal, the favorite poet and Roman Catholic cleric who turned a symbol of innovative verse in Nicaragua and spherical Latin The US, and whose suspension from the priesthood by St.
